settings.text: Need a different size or style? No worries! We've got you covered. You can easily return or exchange your item. Contact us at contact@hildamode.co.uk
We are in the process of opening an offline store in London this year. Stay tuned and see you there!

settings.content:
• Free shipping on all orders over GBP 20
  • The order will be shipped within 1-3 business days
  • Delivery time is 5-8 days nationwide.
  • Tracking numbers will be provided after the item is shipped.
  • Hassle-free returns up to 30 daysIf the customer chooses to return the item, the customers will bears the shipping costs and the associated taxes. The item must be returned to our warehouse. We will only exchange or refund the item after receiving and inspecting the items.
